attributes.action: Force supermarkets/ banks to have at least 50% of checkouts with a cashier
attributes.background: In a world where technology is soaring,we need to make sure jobs are still available.The government needs to ensure these jobs are protected. Self-checkouts can be confusing and lack human interaction.What kind of society are we if we cannot be nice for two minutes to the cashier while being served?

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for individual businesses
